manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Home Office Chair Office chair offers that you can personally adjust height of the chair to match your needs. You can pull out on the control handle, which allows yours to tilt back sit forward, just push the control handle in to prevent it from tilting. Ergonomic Design High density new sponge, full modelling, good elastic and sitting long time with no variant. Office chair to raise the seat, pull up on the pneumatic control handle. To lower the seat, pull up on the handle until you're at the desired height. Adjustable Lumbar Support Comfortable Ergonomic mesh office chair with nylon adjustable lumbar support to provide exceptional support, gives you a better seating experience. Flip-up Armrests: Save Space Office chair have ergonomic armrest design can help improve your posture and reduce tension in your shoulders and spine. Working, reading, gaming, you can live your life what you want.

Breathable Mesh Fabric Office chair using high-density sponge cushion and breathable premium mesh fabric, more flexible, fashion upholstery, beautifully designed. High-level Seating Comfort Office chair high density new sponge, good elastic and sitting long time with no variant. It helps promote a comfortable seated position. Solid & Stable Computer chair are designed with human-oriented ergonomic construction that lasts long, and office chair maximum capacity up to 250 lbs, and the base has 2500lbs. 360-Degree Swivel & Casters Office chair have swivels 360 degrees for multitasking convenience, rolling 100000, and its durable casters allow for smooth-rolling mobility from one area to another area.

Office chair can satisfy all your daily needs. The highly ventilated mesh back will keep you from getting stuffy when you are using it for a long time. The soft and moderate sponge cushion will fit into your sitting position for a long time. The back and armrest of the office chair are ergonomically designed so that you won't feel tired even after a long period of work. The bottom of the desk chair is equipped with a tension adjusting knob to provide a certain degree of tilt so that you can relax after work. The adjusting lever can help you adjust the height of the seat so that the chair can reach your ideal height from16.9-20inches. Our computer chairs are suitable for all kinds of occasions, besides office, sitting in our chairs for video games is also a very good choice. Feature New office chair style, beautiful generous and strong practicability. This office chair has an extremely comfortable nylon mesh back that supports back. Size and look makes the desk chair ideal for any conference room or office seating, the back executive styling to make you feel relax. The computer desk chair with nylon base and arms supports are an attractive contrast to the black finish, with lock height control. 360 degree swivel wheel and chair can be more flexible in working station. All accessories are passed BIFMA test. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was confused for a second but once you use the longer nails on step two then everything else goes smoothly. Nice product worth the price and is great and soft for me .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up. It’s good although sometimes I feel it’s fragile when I’m relaxing on it.Overall nice seat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice chair at a relatively bargain price.
reviews.reviewText: After receiving delivery, it took about 20 minutes to assemble. Hardest part was deciphering the assigned letter-number combinations on the package of parts to those on the assembly instructions. Fabric is sound, the arms are at a comfortable height and position, and they do rotate up - parallel to the chair back and out of way for easy entrance and exit. The chair bottom is wider than others that I have bought with a solid mounting base (wood?). Rated comfort as 4 stars as the padding is not quite as thick as other chairs I've had. Will have to see as time passes if the padding stays firmly comfortable or not. Overall, pleased with this purchased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The reviews about this chair were ether it was straight trash or excellent to me it’s been good I’m about 5’10 I use it for gaming so I can’t say how comfortable it will be after hours upon hours but I can use it for 3 hours straight now back problems

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worthless uncomfortable junk
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this in June of last year, so I've been using this for about 14 months and never once felt comfortable in it. And just now, this chair almost got me killed! See below.(sidenote: It was actually pretty easy to assemble, but why assemble a piece of garbage that feels horrible and breaks in a really dangerous way? So, one star for that as well)Comfort/ergonomic issues:From the backrest to the front of the seat is over 20 inches so unless you're incredibly tall or most of your height is only in your thighs, you're going to feel tightness and soreness in your knees and thighs after using it. In addition, the lumbar support barely goes above the padding of the seat. That means the people designing this thing have zero understanding of how humans are shaped. How would a human with 20+ inch long thighs have their lumbar located at the very bottom of the seat!? I guess I'm saying this doesn't even make sense for tall people.ACTUALLY DANGEROUSLooking at it now this thing must have been made from repurposed, repainted scrap metal, that's all I can think. I'm not rough on my equipment, I'm an office guy, I don't slam down on my seat, I sit in it and I type. I'm 175 pounds, so any adult chair of even moderate quality should be fine under my weight. But just a moment ago, I was thinking to myself "that's weird, the peg is in but it's letting me lean back..." SNAP the seat rips backwards and I nearly smashed my head on a shelf behind me. See the picture. The metal holding the seat in place bends like taffy. Now that it's broken I was actualy able to bend some of the metal back "into shape" with my fingertips.I know it's been a year and it probably won't happen, but I want my money back. What an actual piece of garbage. Don't buy this. Don't let your friends buy this. I've bought office chairs around the same price that lasted me a decade, through rough "college guy" times and everything. This broke after a year of calmly sitting down in it in the morning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Buy a better chair
reviews.reviewText: We bought a HON office chair on Amazon Prime Day. It was $145 on a good sale. We needed another chair and choose this one after looking at quite a few, for just under $75. We weren't trying to get something for nothing but we didn't want to spend even as much as we did for the HON on sale. Well, you really do get what you pay for.This chair is OK. It is not great, for sure. Time will tell if it's even good. I will raise my rating to 4 stars if it's still ok after awhile but there's nothing about it that would make it a 5 star chair.Comparing to the HON, this one is shipped in more parts meaning, more to assemble. The instructions are TERRIBLE. Really bad. I was grateful for the reviewer who marked them up with the right information and included that in their review. Sorry, I don't remember their name but if you are having trouble, go look for that review! That is what saved us. The problem is that the bolts and other parts are labeled one way on the packaging, another way in the parts list, and yet another way in the instructions. Hmmm.But, we got past that nuttiness and started putting the chair together. Really, 15 minutes should be tops time for this assembly but I'd already spent over 20 minutes just trying to sort out the hardware issue. The wheels go on easy enough, oh, and had to snap one of the legs on. Not sure why it was sent in two parts, perhaps for shipping reasons. Seems that would be a weak link though. The HON shipped without doing that, just a little bigger box. It also shipped with other parts already attached,There are some good scuffs on this chair. I assume they happened either in assembly or during packaging. Doesn't affect the mechanics of the chair but when you buy something new you like it to look new - at least I do.Where the holes are for the bolts there is quite a bit of spare plastic which should have been cleaned off during manufacturing. Mostly it won't hurt anything but it makes it look cheap. And, well, it is cheap. Cheap meaning not well made. One of the holes for attaching the arm to the seat bottom was stripped. We didn't strip it, it was stripped from the gitgo. Husband managed to fix it. I don't think we should need to repair a brand new item just to assemble it though.That said, it's together and we have sat on it. We'll need to monkey with the adjustments but just sitting on it I can tell it's not sturdy like the HON. The seat rocks a bit on the pedestal. Maybe there's some way to fix that, we'll try.Look, if all you have is $75 or whatever the price is at the time you're looking, it's an ok chair. It's better than no chair, and it's probably better than a lot of other chairs out there, but it's also not as good as many better chairs. Of course, those are more expensive. If you want a good chair that will last you a few or more years though, spend for it now and skip this one.I'll update my post after using the chair awhile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: We bought these for our tweens. They seem sturdy and comfortable. I like that the arms can be lowered or raised depending on preference. We got one in blue and one in red. The were not particularly easy to put together, and we put a lot of furniture together. It is a two person job and the instructions are not great. The product is good though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars More For Taller Folks
reviews.reviewText: It came together easy enough, but I ended up replacing the wheels right away because they’re a flimsy plastic. The seat has very little cushion and the range of adjustment isn’t enough for my short height. It would be better for a taller person. (I’m 5’2”) I like the fact that the arms flip up though. The back is supportive, again if you can reach it with longer legs. Not good for a short person to sit in all day. More of a task chair (short time).

reviews.reviewTitle: Wish l had got it a lot sooner
reviews.reviewText: Love my chair , it was very easy to put together.l got the pink one because lam using mine In my sewing room and my colours are teal ,pink and purple. It matches really well. It’s works well with my sewing table because the arm rests go up and down making it easier to slide under my table as well l can put one arm rest down and get out much easier as there is not a all of room . When I’m doing other things at this table I can use both arm rests and sit comfortably with support . The seat is covered in fabric not vinyl witch is great for me.
I like the sturdiness and the padded seat.What I don't like is the fact that the back rest can't be adjusted. Feels like I am falling out of the chair.

reviews.reviewTitle: 普段使いにコスパ良き
reviews.reviewText: 仕事部屋用に。サイズ感も良いしコスパ的には満足、少し重いのは気になります

Super comfy. Started back school and it makes sitting in it for long hours not just tolerable but DESIRABLE! Love the color it’s super cute & unique to me. Waaay better price + product than anything I was finding in the store. I needed help with maybe 1 or 2 steps (it seemed a 2 person job) besides that I put everything together alone in about 30mins!Sorry I don’t have more pics of JUST the product but here is me sitting comfortably in it
特にトラブルもなく、普通に組み立てられました。座って感触もなかなかいいです
